name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  Yule 1 + Peccei 1: Definition and background
03  Yule 2: Deixis and distance
04  Yule 3: Reference and inference
05  Yule 4: Presupposition and entailment
06  Yule 5: Cooperation and implication
07  Yule 6: Speech acts and events
08  INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE (APPLINX)
09  Yule 7: Politeness and
10  interactionYule 8: Conversation and preference structure
+ Yule 9: Discourse and culture
11  (Presentation) Peccei 2: Entailment
12  (Presentation) Peccei 3: Presuppositon
13  (Presentation) Peccei 4: The co-operative principle & implicature
14  (Presentation) Peccei 5: More on implicatures
15  (Presentation) Peccei 6: Speech acts
16  (Presentation) Peccei 7: More about speech acts
17  (Presentation) Peccei 8: Politeness
18  (Presentation) Peccei 9: Making Sense
materials:
1. Yule, George: Pragmatics (Oxford)
2. Peccei, Jean Stilwell: Pragmatics (Routledge)
